Name: Undisclosed Distribution Channels
Title: Navia: Undisclosed Distribution Channels
Source: Reward for inviting Navia to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Undisclosed Distribution Channels
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1608]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1608] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S16082]</color> once.
After your $[A1608], who has this card equipped, uses a Skill: Draw 2 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116081]</color> cards. (Once per Round)
(You must have $[A1608] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C116081.Name: Crystal Shrapnel
C116081.Desc: Deal 1 $[K100] to the opponent's active character and draw 1 card.

K100.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>
K100.Desc: Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
